content:
A selection of three defining articles read aloud from the latest issue of The Economist

THIS WEEK, Binyamin Netanyahu , prime minister of Israel, provides a parable of modern populism. Flaws in Bitcoin suggest that a lasting revival of cryptocurrencies is unlikely (9’20). And why museums should return stolen art , but accept donations from almost anyone (18’57).

Runtime: 24 min

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: 网络 捐款；捐献；捐赠品
eg2: to make a donation to charity
向慈善事业捐赠
a generous/large/small donation
慷慨╱大量╱少量捐助
a donation of £200/a £200 donation
200 英镑的捐款
The work of the charity is funded by voluntary donations.
这家慈善机构工作所需资金是人们自愿捐赠的。
organ donation(= allowing doctors to use an organ from your body after your death in order to save a sick person's life)
器官捐献

ex: n. 寓言，比喻；隐晦或谜般的格言
eg2: Hear ye therefore the  of the sower.
所以你们当听这撒种的比喻。
His story became a  for the fickleness of art and life.
他的故事成为一个说明艺术与生活变化无常的寓言。
And he said unto them, Know ye not this ? and how then will ye know all parables?
又对他们说，你们不明白这比喻吗。 这样怎能明白一切的比喻呢。

ex: n. 平民政治；民粹主义；民意论
网络 平民主义；民众主义；人民党主义

wp.Revival Factor: 青春赋活因子;与西方青春赋活之子
wp.economic revival: 经济振兴;经济复苏;城市经济复兴
wp.Celtic Revival: 凯尔特复兴;爱尔兰凯尔特复兴

ex: n. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效
eg2: But such moral ‘’ isn’t only for cadres and bureaucrats.
但是这种道德“复兴”并不只是针对干部和官员的。
He could not confess Veronica’s  in his life, for that would entail confession of the earlier liaison.
他不能够承认维罗妮卡在他的生活中复活了，因为这牵扯到要承认他们以前的隐情。
Any sustained economic recovery will ultimately have to come from the  in private demand—i.e., through consumption and investment—both of which will be constrained by structural factors.
任何可持续的经济复苏最终都必将来自私人需求的苏醒——也就是说消费和投资——这两者都将受到结构性因素的制约。

Title: Binyamin Netanyahu, Bitcoin’s flaws and returning stolen art
